title: snap_restore: cannot elect leader when start up.
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
latest master and release-6.5

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
irrlative

### Steps to reproduce
run snapshot restore via TiDB operator.

### What did you expect?
it success.

### What did happened?
it cannot elect leader, all election messages are dropped due to "unsafe_vote".

Ref: https://github.com/tikv/tikv/pull/15085
